long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sound notifications for new Zendesk tickets from views of your choise

This extension will notify you of new tickets you receive on the view of your choice, in real-time, with a sound alert and/or a chrome popup alert. Clicking on the ticket in the extension opens the Zendesk ticket in the already open Zendesk tab or a new chrome tab.

30-day free trial and then 5$/mo
